metadata.name: Dream Highway #1/22
metadata.description:
[Dream Highway](https://infiniteobjects.com/products/cadaf-x-io-collection-anne-spalter-dream-highway-io) brings the viewer on a vertiginous journey along a sharply curving mountain road. The original driving footage, which includes spinning wind turbines, warning arrows and guard rails is montaged through multiple cuts, zooms, and fades to create a dreamlike atmosphere and convey the centrifugal force and sensation of outdoor adventure.

Please scan the QR code on your IO to verify your certificate of authenticity, on-chain. We highly recommend keeping the physical and NFT versions of the piece together for any sales.

[CADAF x IO Collection](https://infiniteobjects.com/products/cadaf-x-io-collection-anne-spalter-dream-highway-io): This collection brings together a leading group of artists who create a distinct visual language and representations of their surrounding space. Together, these artworks generate a universe of its own, from impossible architecture, visions of the sky, poetic notions, dreamlike landscapes and intimate objects. This collection invites viewers to experience and explore a modular universe inspired by art and technology. 

CADAF and Infinite Objects are proud to bring this special collection to life. All artworks will be available as an edition of 22, with physical and digital presence (Infinite Object Display + NFT).
